attributes.action: stop wasting british tax payers money putting road signs in welsh .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should english , scottish and irish citizens have to contibute to pay for signs in welsh and emergency vehicles to be painted in welsh ,this is a burden on the tax payer , just to look politically correct ,how many welsh speaking people dont understand english! . exactly . this is a total waste of tax payers money .
